ferrothorn:LeechSeed.NAME: Leech Seed
ferrothorn:LeechSeed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! ferrothorn:Leech_Seed. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:Protect.NAME: Protect
ferrothorn:Protect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Gain !M! Intangible. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:BodyPress.NAME: Body Press
ferrothorn:BodyPress.DESCRIPTION: Deal !B! damage. NL Affected by Block modifiers instead of damage ones.
ferrothorn:BodyPress.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !B! damage. NL Affected by Block modifiers instead of damage ones. NL Ignores Frail.

ferrothorn:BulletSeed.NAME: Bullet Seed
ferrothorn:BulletSeed.DESCRIPTION: Randomly add from !M! to 5 *Seeds into your hand.

ferrothorn:Curse.NAME: Curse
ferrothorn:Curse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Shuffle a Wound into your draw pile.
ferrothorn:Curse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Shuffle a Wound into your discard pile.

ferrothorn:Endure.NAME: Endure
ferrothorn:Endure.DESCRIPTION: The first time you lose HP, gain !B! Block.

ferrothorn:HyperBeam.NAME: Hyper Beam
ferrothorn:HyperBeam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, lose [E] .

ferrothorn:Ingrain.NAME: Ingrain
ferrothorn:Ingrain.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:KnockOff.NAME: Knock Off
ferrothorn:KnockOff.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals an additional !M! damage for each Buff on the enemy.

ferrothorn:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
ferrothorn:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double if the enemy intends to attack.

ferrothorn:Rollout.NAME: Rollout
ferrothorn:Rollout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

ferrothorn:SeedBomb.NAME: Seed Bomb
ferrothorn:SeedBomb.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Seed+ to your hand and double its damage.
ferrothorn:SeedBomb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Seed+ to your hand. NL Double the damage NL of ALL Seed cards in your hand.

ferrothorn:Substitute.NAME: Substitute
ferrothorn:Substitute.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP. NL Prevent the next time you would lose HP. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:Swagger.NAME: Swagger
ferrothorn:Swagger.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Strength to the enemy to stun him. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:WeatherBall.NAME: Weather Ball
ferrothorn:WeatherBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Effect varies with ferrothorn:Weather.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Effect varies with ferrothorn:Weather.
Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Effect varies with ferrothorn:Weather.
Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Effect varies with ferrothorn:Weather.
#ySandstorm: deal damage twice. NL #yRain: Apply #yWeak. NL #yHarsh #ySunlight: Apply #yVulnerable.

ferrothorn:HeavySlam.NAME: Heavy Slam
ferrothorn:HeavySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to your Max HP exceeding 100.

ferrothorn:GyroBall.NAME: Gyro Ball
ferrothorn:GyroBall.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals !M! additional damage for each Relic you have.

ferrothorn:ShoreUp.NAME: Shore Up
ferrothorn:ShoreUp.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated Armor. NL In ferrothorn:Sandstorm gain additional Plated Armor equal to your Dexterity.

ferrothorn:SolarBeam.NAME: Solar Beam
ferrothorn:SolarBeam.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Solar *Beam *Attack into your draw pile. NL In ferrothorn:Harsh_Sunlight add it to your hand instead.
ferrothorn:SolarBeam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Solar *Beam *Attack+ into your draw pile. NL In ferrothorn:Harsh_Sunlight add it to your hand instead.

ferrothorn:Thunder.NAME: Thunder
ferrothorn:Thunder.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Block from an enemy. NL Deal !D! damage. NL In ferrothorn:Rain this costs 0.

ferrothorn:GrassKnot.NAME: Grass Knot
ferrothorn:GrassKnot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Repeat for each thousand Max HP of the enemy.

ferrothorn:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
ferrothorn:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: The enemy instantly attacks you for !M! damage twice.
ferrothorn:Taunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The enemy instantly attacks you for !M! damage three times.

ferrothorn:AncientPower.NAME: Ancient Power
ferrothorn:AncientPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Gain !M! Metallicize. NL Gain !M! Plated Armor.

ferrothorn:StrengthSap.NAME: Strength Sap
ferrothorn:StrengthSap.DESCRIPTION: Heal HP equal to enemy's Strength. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:WorrySeed.NAME: Worry Seed
ferrothorn:WorrySeed.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! *Seeds into your hand. NL Then transform ALL Seed cards in your hand into *Insomnia.

ferrothorn:DoubleTeam.NAME: Double Team
ferrothorn:DoubleTeam.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn gain !B! Block.

ferrothorn:AcidSpray.NAME: Acid Spray
ferrothorn:AcidSpray.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain ferrothorn:Stamina equal to unblocked damage dealt.

ferrothorn:Synthesis.NAME: Synthesis
ferrothorn:Synthesis.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Activate exiting effects of your current ferrothorn:Weather.

ferrothorn:KingsShield.NAME: King's Shield
ferrothorn:KingsShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! Weak back.

ferrothorn:WideGuard.NAME: Wide Guard
ferrothorn:WideGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn.
ferrothorn:WideGuard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next !M! turns.

ferrothorn:Stockpile.NAME: Stockpile
ferrothorn:Stockpile.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain ferrothorn:Stamina equal to the damage blocked.

ferrothorn:MetalBurst.NAME: Metal Burst
ferrothorn:MetalBurst.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Block, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

ferrothorn:SpitUpSwallow.NAME: Spit Up / Swallow
ferrothorn:SpitUpSwallow.DESCRIPTION: Chose one : NL Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies X times, NL or Gain !B! Block X times.

ferrothorn:SpitUp.NAME: Spit Up
ferrothorn:SpitUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to ALL enemies X times.

ferrothorn:ShiftGear.NAME: Shift Gear
ferrothorn:ShiftGear.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Dexterity affects this card twice.
ferrothorn:ShiftGear.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Dexterity affects this card three times.

ferrothorn:FollowMe.NAME: Follow Me
ferrothorn:FollowMe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL ALL enemies instantly attack you for !M! damage.

ferrothorn:PoisonSting.NAME: Poison Sting
ferrothorn:PoisonSting.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply Poison equal to unblocked damage dealt.

ferrothorn:StickyWeb.NAME: Sticky Web
ferrothorn:StickyWeb.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, draw !M! card.
ferrothorn:StickyWeb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you are attacked, draw !M! card.

ferrothorn:DiamondStorm.NAME: Diamond Storm
ferrothorn:DiamondStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block twice.

ferrothorn:Superpower.NAME: Superpower
ferrothorn:Superpower.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose !M! Strength and Dexterity.

ferrothorn:DefenseCurl.NAME: Defense Curl
ferrothorn:DefenseCurl.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Metallicize. NL At the end of combat, heal !M! HP.

ferrothorn:Payback.NAME: Payback
ferrothorn:Payback.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this card is in your hand at the end of your turn, increase its damage by !M! this combat.

ferrothorn:ShellTrap.NAME: Shell Trap
ferrothorn:ShellTrap.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage to the attacker.

ferrothorn:QuickGuard.NAME: Quick Guard
ferrothorn:QuickGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Draw a card for each enemy that intends to attack you.

ferrothorn:Wish.NAME: Wish
ferrothorn:Wish.DESCRIPTION: Next turn gain Block equal to half your current Block.

ferrothorn:TeeterDance.NAME: Teeter Dance
ferrothorn:TeeterDance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

ferrothorn:FoulPlay.NAME: Foul Play
ferrothorn:FoulPlay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Use the enemy's powers instead of yours to calculate damage.

ferrothorn:AerialAce.NAME: Aerial Ace
ferrothorn:AerialAce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL You can always play this card. NL This card always deals !D! damage.

ferrothorn:RagePowder.NAME: Rage Powder
ferrothorn:RagePowder.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL The enemy performs its attack on you and himself.
ferrothorn:RagePowder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL The enemy performs its attack on EVERYONE.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The enemy doesn't intend to attack.

ferrothorn:Moonlight.NAME: Moonlight
ferrothorn:Moonlight.DESCRIPTION: Choose a ferrothorn:Weather to enter. Activate exiting effects of the other two. NL Exhaust.
ferrothorn:Moonlight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Choose a ferrothorn:Weather to enter. Activate exiting effects of the other two. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:Flatter.NAME: Flatter
ferrothorn:Flatter.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Give !M! Strength to the enemy.

ferrothorn:Assist.NAME: Assist
ferrothorn:Assist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

ferrothorn:SuckerPunch.NAME: Sucker Punch
ferrothorn:SuckerPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block instead.

ferrothorn:MorningSun.NAME: Morning Sun
ferrothorn:MorningSun.DESCRIPTION: Gain hazards varying with ferrothorn:Weather. NL Exhaust.

No #yWeather: Whenever you are attacked, draw 1 card. NL #ySandstorm: #yScales. NL #yRain: #yToxic #ySpikes. NL #yHarsh #ySunlight: #yThorns.

ferrothorn:AfterYou.NAME: After You
ferrothorn:AfterYou.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL It costs 0 until played.

ferrothorn:Defog.NAME: Defog
ferrothorn:Defog.DESCRIPTION: Exit your ferrothorn:Weather. NL Remove Strength on EVERYONE. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:HelpingHand.NAME: Helping Hand
ferrothorn:HelpingHand.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals double the damage. NL Exhaust.
ferrothorn:HelpingHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals double the damage.

ferrothorn:MagnetRise.NAME: Magnet Rise
ferrothorn:MagnetRise.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.
ferrothorn:MagnetRise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] . NL Gain [E] for each enemy in combat. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:Growth.NAME: Growth
ferrothorn:Growth.DESCRIPTION: Activate exiting effects of your current ferrothorn:Weather twice. if you are not in a ferrothorn:Weather, enter a random one.

ferrothorn:Autotomize.NAME: Autotomize
ferrothorn:Autotomize.DESCRIPTION: Draw !B! cards. NL Affected by Block modifiers.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw !B! card. NL Affected by Block modifiers.

ferrothorn:FellStinger.NAME: Fell Stinger
ferrothorn:FellStinger.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy dies, add a copy of this to your hand. NL Exhaust.
ferrothorn:FellStinger.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy dies, add a copy of this to your hand that costs 0. NL Exhaust.

ferrothorn:Encore.NAME: Encore
ferrothorn:Encore.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, set it's base damage to !M! this turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The enemy doesn't intend to attack.
